mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHALL_TABLE (title, description, category_idx, state, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{categoryIdx}, #{state}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CHALL_IDX, CHALL_TITLE, CHALL_DESCRIPTION, CHALL_CATEGORY_IDX, MAX_PARTICIPANTS, CHALL_CREATED_AT, CHALL_END_TIME FROM CHALL_TABLE WHERE CHALL_END_TIME IS NULL OR CHALL_END_TIME > SYSDATE ORDER BY CHALL_CREATED_AT DESC
